entry.title: Concern about "Inscriptions".
entry.summary: Upon further investigation, it has become evident that the main concern regarding blockchain technology is not storage capacity, but rather the time it takes for the initial blockchain sync. Luke Dashjr provided valuable insight in this matter. Nevertheless, storage does play a crucial role in the current scenario. UTreeXO appears to be a promising solution in addressing this issue, marking it as an encouraging first step. It is worth exploring more efficient methods of syncing the chain without the need to download everything while maintaining trustless verification.
